html:
Hop hammer hitting my head
Bubbles in my belly
I count if I love her it’s enough
I love her and it’s too little
Her eyes smarter than ever
She is inteligent as hell
I better be silent
I worry she reads this
Darkness around me
Being saved by a silly lightbulb
Her eyes stalking me
I just cannot forget
Her eyes getting me
Blue strike of beauty
Blue strike of intelligence
Killing me to death
title: Hop
